name: ProtectedRegionImport Eclipse Plugin
short_description: When generating code via templates sometimes so called protected regions are used. These protected region sections will not be overwritten by the generator. A protected region contains the specific import statements. This plugin adds quick fixes to place missing imports in this special protected region (concrete before the ending tag of the protected region).
summary: Eclipse Plugin for placing import statements in protected regions
